alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Duplin; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Onslow and southern Duplin Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wallace to Murray Town to near Castle Hayne. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 30 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, North Topsail Beach, Wallace, New River Station, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Half Moon, Camp Lejeune Center, Rose Hill, Richlands, Beulaville, Catherine Lake, Folkstone, Cypress Creek, Midway Park, Verona, Dixon, Chinquapin, Petersburg and Albert J Ellis Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
